programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 – Jericoacoara (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour will electrify the coast of Jericoacoara, Brazil, with competitions in its three big air divisions - TwinTip, Hydrofoil and Surfboard. A total of 57 athletes will be competing for the world championship titles at the premiere.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Dakhla (MAR) - Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: Natural Track Luge World Cup 2019/20 Final - Umhausen (AUT)
programme.desc: Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - Stop 2 - Kicking Horse (CAN)
programme.desc: Between February 06th – 12th the second stop of the Freeride World Tour 2020 will take place in Golden B.C. Kicking Horse, Canada. After the season kick off in Japan, the world’s best freeriders in the categories ski & snowboard men and women will battle it out again.

programme.title: Faces of Valais - Teil 1
programme.desc: Valais is the third-biggest canton of Switzerland. It’s situated in the Southwest of Switzerland. We explored this stunning landscape for more than a year. The central element in our voyage though was water.

programme.desc: Valais is the third-biggest canton of Switzerland. It’s situated in the Southwest of Switzerland. We explored this stunning landscape for more than a year. The central element in our voyage though was water.

programme.desc: Climbing on speed record in Yosemite Valley (USA) / Unicycling on the Damavand (IR) / Climbing at the Bürser Platte (Austria). Various athletes, different outdoor sports and unique stories - this combines the adidas Outdoorsportsteam.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2023 - Stage 2
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2023 - Stage 3
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2023 - Stage 4
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: Engadinsnow - Silvaplana (SUI)
programme.desc: ENGADINSNOW is one of the oldest freeride competitions in the Alps. It is the world's only parallel freeride event. Teams of two ride the Corvatsch north face at the same time and compete with other teams.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Best Of Season 2020 - Worldwide
programme.desc: The first stop of this year's Freeride World Tour was in Hakuba, Japan. Next the tour went to Kicking Horse in British Columbia. The third stop took the riders to Ordino Arcalis in the Pyrenees. The last stop was Fieberbrunn in Austria.

programme.title: Outdoorsportsteam - Stikine River & Place of Happiness

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Dakhla (MAR) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 is coming to Dakhla, bringing the best wingfoilers in the world to this Moroccan paradise. With its reliable winds and breathtaking landscapes, Dakhla offers the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.desc: RB Romaniacs challenges hundreds of dedicated amateur participants to compete alongside the world's best professionals. They gather in Sibiu, Romania. Participants come from over 60 countries and continents around the world.

programme.desc: For this route from Ruhpolding (GER) to Kasern (ITA), 210 kilometers and more than 10000 meters of vert, recreational athletes need approximately five to seven days. Benedikt Boehm is aiming for the magic time limit of 36 hours, non-stop.

programme.title: Underdog
programme.desc: The Ultra-Trail du Mont-Blanc© - Edition 2018171 kilometers - 10,000 meters ascent - 2,300 runnersFor the 2018 UTMB© Damian Hall is ranked 50th by the International Trail Running Association© (ITRA© ).

programme.desc: A comedy documentary about a girl working in the ski industry who decides to become one of the stars: they go up, they go down, how difficult can it be? Needless to say, she finds out how hard it really can be.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Live delayed Part 1

programme.title: WOF 2024 #01: Winter Games New Zealand - Park Jam Team Challenge
programme.desc: Building on the success of the Big Air, get ready for the next thrilling New Zealand Winter Games episode, The Park Jam Team Challenge! Witness the fusion of skill and creativity as Freestyle Skiers and Snowboarders showcase their prowess in this high-energy competition.

programme.title: LINE OF SIGHT | A Look into Wingsuit BASE Jumping
programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #02: Winter Games New Zealand - Back Country Freestyle Challenge
programme.desc: Back to the third episode of the New Zealand Winter Games 2023! This time, we dive into the exhilarating world of Back Country Freestyle, where athletes shows their skills in the untouched winter landscapes in the southern Alps of New Zealand. Get ready for an adrenaline-packed adventure!

programme.title: Loic and the Flolopapys
programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria

programme.title: Strongman Champions League

programme.title: Strongman Champions League

This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland

programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania

programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League

programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Bill Mahood has studied every martial art imaginable, and he'll need all that experience when he takes on Kalil Ibrahim, a karate ans kickboxing expert. Steve Steinbeiss fights Jeff Ford, an MMA champion and a personal trainer on VH1's Celebrity Fight Club.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: In a showdown between the winners from Series 1 and the powerhouse Russian Red Devils, Mario Rinaldi is in tough against Sergey Kaznovski. The Russian is reknowned for short, brutal fights, earning him a reputation as the king of the 1st round KO. This is not the first time Trevor Pragley and Andrei Semenov have met in the ring. Last time, Semenov was battered into submission, so he come into this fight hungry for revenge.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Fabricio Santos De Jesus was introduced to Judo as a child while he was still living in Brazil. He was also introduced to Capoeira, becoming Champion of Brazil and International Capoeira Champion. He has been able to transfer his knowledge of the control of movement and is now recognized for this knowledge as a coach in MMA community. Hard Knocks Fighter Jess Elverum, among others, using his teachings to expand their flexibility and dexterity, becoming more fluid and calm in movement.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Josh Lee is highly respected in the MMA community for his wrestling skills. In this episode, we follow Josh throughout his day, and see some well known HK fighters who have trained under him, such as Jess Elverum. It is Josh's hope that his ability to transfer his knowledge of wrestling will make big difference in his students' fighting. He would also love to see more people take up wrestling.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Vladimir Zenin posts an incredible record, but Nick Agallar is ready for him. Battle hardened from serving in Iraq, this Milwakee brawler will have to be ready for whatever the Red Devil can throw his way. One of the most experienced fighters in the series, Nick Thompson has the scars to prove it. Ansar Chalangov will be looking to come out hard for the Russians. Tara LaRosa solidified her reputation as one of the top female fighters in Mixed Martial Arts in Series 1.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Diego Gonzalez attenmpts to go to the ground while his opponent Matt Thorpe tries to keep the fight on the feet. In this episode's other fight, veteran fighter Derrick Noble takes on the well-rounded Jake Ellenberger, and American martial artist from Omaha, Bebraska.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Tyler 'TNT' Jackson puts his knockout power to the test against sambo expert Dmitri Samoilov from Russia. When Jorge Masvidal and Steve Berger square off, it's a battle of brash confidence vs cool experience.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coach Brian Bird takes immense pride in his work, not only with competitive fighters, such as UFC Veteran Nick Ring, but with every athlete who enters his gym. His background is in Karate and Kung Fu. However, watching the first UFC event convinced him that he needed to incorporate grappling and Jiu Jitsu into his coaching arsenal. He now runs a well respected MMA club as a family business... and he most enjoys teaching grappling.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Fabricio Santos De Jesus was introduced to Judo as a child while he was still living in Brazil. He was also introduced to Capoeira, becoming Champion of Brazil and International Capoeira Champion. He has been able to transfer his knowledge of the control of movement and is now recognized for this knowledge as a coach in MMA community. Hard Knocks Fighter Jess Elverum, among others, using his teachings to expand their flexibility and dexterity, becoming more fluid and calm in movement.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: CJ Hollett is a Brazilian Jiu Jitsu Black Belt who loves teaching his craft. He is very well respected as an MMA coach for his technical mindset, high level skills and experience coaching UFC fighters. CJ loves working with MMA fighters because of their hunger to win, and believes it's time for Jiu Jitsu to make a resurgence in the MMA cage.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E60 Jodha Akbar S4 E60
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 This is Fate S2 E20
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E367 Undercover Love S1 E367
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E122 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E122
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E368 King of Hearts S1 E368
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E368 Second Chances S1 E368
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.sub-title: S01 : E370 Second Chances S1 E370
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Supercars of the Frankfurt Motor Show
programme.desc: We took a look at the IAA Frankfurt 2011 highlights, like the new Porsche 911, Mercedes' SLS AMG Roadster, the Bentley Continental Convertible, a 1,100 hp monster from Croatia and others.

programme.title: Episode 16
programme.desc: In this episode we invite you to witness the progress of driver Uwe Nittle as he got ready for qualifying at the Truck Grand Prix.

programme.title: Episode 13
programme.desc: The Nuerburgring shook when the VLN began its second leg of the tournament. We once again accompany you to this exciting competition, including the highlights of BMW's 1st leg win.

programme.title: Episode 13
programme.desc: The Nuerburgring shook when the VLN began its second leg of the tournament. We once again accompany you to this exciting competition, including the highlights of BMW's 1st leg win.

programme.title: BMW Motorrad Berlin
programme.desc: The first vehicle that BMW ever produced was a motorcycle, the R23. We take a look at the brand's motorcycle factory in Berlin. Also: the KTM 125 Duke, a bike that isn't just for beginners. And: the "Night of the Jumps", an exciting freestyle motocross spectacle at Munich's Olympiahalle.

programme.title: Blacktrail E-Bike
programme.desc: The Blacktrail by PG Bikes is the fastest and lightest E-bike in the world, but also the most expensive. What's behind this exciting power package from Regensburg, Germany? Also: is BMW's new flagship bike, the K 1600 GT with 6 cylinders really worth its price and is it able to stand up to the competition by Honda, Kawasaki and Benelli?

programme.title: Episode 22
programme.desc: At the Nuerburgring Patrick chased a 12-cylinder Aston Martin Zagato down the track. Also on the show: a Hummer, a Renault Clio and a Frenchman in a Ferrari.

programme.title: Episode 21
programme.desc: In this episode, we focused on Phoenix Racing, the successful team from the Eifel Region that rocked the DTM.

programme.title: Episode 14
programme.desc: The fourth race of the VLN season is usually regarded as a dress rehearsal for the 24-hour race. For the top teams and best drivers it is the last opportunity for a really thorough test.

programme.title: Women and their Classic Cars
programme.desc: A small group of car enthusiastic ladies offers resistance in the otherwise man dominated classic car world. One of them is Johanna. The 24-year-old loves her 1969 Corvette more than everything.

programme.title: Scrapyard Gold
programme.desc: It is not too unusual to find hidden gems of automotive history in a perfect condition in barns or scrap yards. Also: the MGC GT Sebring, that was built for the 12 Hours of Sebring race.

programme.title: Sportscars for the Masses
programme.desc: The Ford Mustang has been an icon for decades. What makes this car so special? In addition: the Nissan 370 Z Nismo is half as expensive as a Porsche 911, but its power is on par with the German flagship. And: the 7th generation Volkswagen Golf GTI and R.

programme.title: Electrically into the Future
programme.desc: The Tesla Model S is an icon for inventiveness and boldness. In addition: the BMW i3 was the first car from Germany that completly relied on electric propulsion. And: Citroen gave their glimpse into the future with the DS 5 Hybrid.

programme.title: Ferrari FF
programme.desc: The Ferrari Four, also called Ferrari FF, is the first four-wheel family car from Maranello. Also: the BMW M5 shines both as a family and business car. And: the Mercedes-Benz SL is a roadster drivers' dream.

programme.title: When Sports Meets Indulgence
programme.desc: Luxury class grand tourers with four doors. Porsche introduced their Panamera as a Plugin Hybrid or equipped with new turbo engines. BMW responded with their M6 Gran Coupe. German engineering at its finest.

programme.title: Salto Mortale
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes face a new mission: performing a front-flip through the air with a stuntman behind the wheel of an estate wagon. Stuntmen Daniel and Lars display a brilliant fight choreography in some spectacular driving scenes.

programme.title: The Remote Control
programme.desc: Stuntman Tobi operates an Artega GT at full speed via remote control. This is just a warm-up before the big stunt, in which he drives a car up a steep ramp at 68 mph. The question is: How high can remote-controlled cars fly?

programme.title: Episode 21
programme.desc: In this episode, we focused on Phoenix Racing, the successful team from the Eifel Region that rocked the DTM.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Kelleners KS1 RS
programme.desc: The BMW One M Coupe from the former race-driver Ralf Kelleners: the KS1 RS is one of the highlights in 2012. Also: another big score from Porsche, the beautiful 911 cabriolet. And: the Bentley Continental GT V8 is a dream car.

programme.title: Porsche to the Max
programme.desc: The Techart Grand GT by Porsche's house tuner is a souped-up Panamera. But the off-the-shelf GTS model also has its treats. Patrick Simon took this monster to the track. In addition: Ruf's anniversary model RT 35. And: the 911 Carrera 4.

programme.title: BMW Motorrad Berlin
programme.desc: The first vehicle that BMW ever produced was a motorcycle, the R23. We take a look at the brand's motorcycle factory in Berlin. Also: the KTM 125 Duke, a bike that isn't just for beginners. And: the "Night of the Jumps", an exciting freestyle motocross spectacle at Munich's Olympiahalle.

Also: is BMW's new flagship bike, the K 1600 GT with 6 cylinders really worth its price and is it able to stand up to the competition by Honda, Kawasaki and Benelli?

programme.title: Episode 22

programme.title: Episode 21
programme.desc: In this episode, we focused on Phoenix Racing, the successful team from the Eifel Region that rocked the DTM.

programme.title: Episode 14
programme.desc: The fourth race of the VLN season is usually regarded as a dress rehearsal for the 24-hour race. For the top teams and best drivers it is the last opportunity for a really thorough test.

programme.title: Ron Williams and his Cadillac
programme.desc: The 1952 Cadillac Fleetwood is also known as the American Rolls-Royce, because it’s the car of celebrities, presidents, millionaires and mafia bosses. One owner of this rare classic car is German-American actor and entertainer Ron Williams.

programme.title: Porsche Carrera RS
programme.desc: In the early 1970s the Porsche Carrera RS was the fastest and most agile production sports car in Germany. Today the RS is a Porsche classic with highest acclaim.

programme.title: Ready for Action
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of some of the exciting stunts at Action Concept, the biggest action movie production company in Europe. Also: Johannes and Ferdinand Stuck with the BMW Alpina D5 Twin Turbo at the test track. And: the Volkswagen Up city car.

programme.title: Changing the model
programme.desc: BMW got into the electric mobility business with their ActiveE and i3 models. We visited the company's technology office in Silicon Valley. Also: the Stuck brothers at the test track with the Mercedes C 63 AMG. And: the Audi A3 Sportback.

programme.title: Mercedes ML 63 AMG
programme.desc: We put the Porsche Cayenne Turbo S and the Mercedes ML 63 AMG to the test. Also: the final round of the truck trial race at the Camp4fun at the Nürburgring in Germany. And: General Motors' new luxury SUV, the Cadillac SRX.

programme.title: Outback Off-Road Adventure
programme.desc: Australia's North-East is famous for its nature and wildlife. We accompanied the Germans Katrin and Uli on their 4x4 tour on the Great Tropical Drive in Queensland. Also: Clash of the Titans. We compared the Toyota Landcruiser and Mitsubishi Pajero.

programme.title: H&R
programme.desc: The leading suspension component manufacturer H&R offers the entire product range from lowering springs to stabilisers and shock absorbers for use in racing and production vehicles.

programme.title: Volkswagen Phaeton Dresden
programme.desc: 2001 saw the new beginning of new chapter for Volkswagen. The company invested 187 million Euros into its so-called 'Transparent Factory' in Dresden to produce its Volkswagen Phaeton, setting new standards in the top class.

programme.title: BMW 5 Series GT, Part 1
programme.desc: What happens to car models that were designed in a thriving market but are launched as final products in times of market crisis? We accompanied the development history of a new BMW model, which starts with a design pitch.

programme.title: Ferruccio Lamborghini
programme.desc: In 1964, Ferruccio Lamborghini set himself the goal to build the best sports cars in the world, a bold move, being located only a few kilometers from Ferrari.

programme.title: Ferry Porsche
programme.desc: After the Second World War, following in his father's footsteps who had been responsible for the development of the classic Volkswagen, Ferry Porsche laid the foundation for the brand's sports car models like the 356 and later the Porsche 911.

programme.title: All- Wheel bedrocks
programme.desc: Even though SUVs have only become trendy in recent years, there are several models that have defined this vehicle category. We present three such veterans: the Toyota RAV4, the Mercedes G-Class and the Jeep Wrangler.

programme.title: All-Wheel-Drive on station wagons
programme.desc: The Skoda Octavia, the Opel Insignia Country Tourer, the Subaru Outback, the Audi S4 allroad quattro and the Seat Leon x-perience want to be more than roomy family cars. Their offroad features show that it doesn't always have to be an SUV.

programme.title: Ready for Action
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of some of the exciting stunts at Action Concept, the biggest action movie production company in Europe. Also: Johannes and Ferdinand Stuck with the BMW Alpina D5 Twin Turbo at the test track. And: the Volkswagen Up city car.

programme.title: Changing the model
programme.desc: BMW got into the electric mobility business with their ActiveE and i3 models. We visited the company's technology office in Silicon Valley. Also: the Stuck brothers at the test track with the Mercedes C 63 AMG. And: the Audi A3 Sportback.

programme.title: BMW Motorrad Berlin
programme.desc: The first vehicle that BMW ever produced was a motorcycle, the R23. We take a look at the brand's motorcycle factory in Berlin. Also: the KTM 125 Duke, a bike that isn't just for beginners. And: the "Night of the Jumps", an exciting freestyle motocross spectacle at Munich's Olympiahalle.

programme.title: Blacktrail E-Bike
programme.desc: The Blacktrail by PG Bikes is the fastest and lightest E-bike in the world, but also the most expensive. What's behind this exciting power package from Regensburg, Germany? Also: is BMW's new flagship bike, the K 1600 GT with 6 cylinders really worth its price and is it able to stand up to the competition by Honda, Kawasaki and Benelli?

programme.title: Bizzarrini 5300 GT
programme.desc: Giotto Bizzarrini was the creator of the famous Ferrari GTO, but after arguments with his employer he left Ferrari early. To get back at Ferrari, Bizzarrini decided to create his own sports car: the Bizzarrini GT 5300.

programme.title: French Classics
programme.desc: French manufacturers have also built milestones in automotive history in the past, including lesser-known brands such as Delage and Talbot, but also vehicles from Peugeot, Renault and Citroen.

programme.title: Offroad for Everybody
programme.desc: Opel's Insignia Tourer Country was the German brand's first family car in outdoor attire. In addition: with the Capture Renault presented their first compact SUV. And: what happens when Fiat's cute compact 500 is inflated to the 500L Trekking?

programme.title: Open Air Concert
programme.desc: As an homage to driving top-down we took a look at three of the most beautiful convertibles. The animalistic sound of the Audi S3 convertible's 4-cylinder is astonishing. But what about the Nissan 370 Z Roadster? Or Porsche's Boxster GTS?

programme.title: Mercedes SLS vs Audi R8
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi once again invite the owners of the most extraordinary cars to Dubai, where they award points for speed, style and sound. This time, they will be joined by a limited edition Mercedes SLS and an Audi R8.

programme.title: BMW X6M vs Nissan Patrol
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: At Jumeirah Beach in Dubai, car owners can have their souped-up vehicles judged in three categories and win an overnight stay at the Sofitel Hotel. This time, a BMW X6M, a Ford F250 and a Nissan Patrol are in the running.

programme.title: Lamborghini
programme.desc: Sant'Agata Bolognese, the home of the iconic Italian sports car manufacturer Lamborghini, is the perfect place to take a look under the hood of the different Gallardo models. Also: cruising through Rome in an Aventador LP700-4.

programme.title: Audi at Le Mans
programme.desc: At the 2012 Le Mans 24 Hours, Audi entered the R18 e-tron quattro for the first time. Also: the Porsche Cayenne GTS, the model between the S and the Turbo. And: the Mercedes-Benz CLS Shooting Brake.

programme.title: Episode 17
programme.desc: The RCN Challenge is the ultimate BMW driving experience. We also paid a visit to the Devils Diner, the track's indoor meeting place for drivers.

programme.title: Episode 18
programme.desc: After the 24-hour race was over we left the Nuerburgring and moved to Büren, Germany, where the Raeder Motorsport company is based. They are famous for front-wheel drives with a great performance that put a lot of horsepower to the track.

programme.title: Episode 13
programme.desc: The Nuerburgring shook when the VLN began its second leg of the tournament. We once again accompany you to this exciting competition, including the highlights of BMW's 1st leg win.

programme.title: Episode 20
programme.desc: At the old-timer grand prix at the Nuerburgring you for example can see the Mercedes S with 160 horsepower that lead Rudolf Caracciola to victory in the 1927 opening race.

programme.title: The Remote Control
programme.desc: Stuntman Tobi operates an Artega GT at full speed via remote control. This is just a warm-up before the big stunt, in which he drives a car up a steep ramp at 68 mph. The question is: How high can remote-controlled cars fly?

programme.title: Stunt Highlights
programme.desc: Stunt coordinator Christoph looks back at the stunts of the last twelve shows and explains why a stunt sometimes works better in a test than on the film set. It's a summary of all the stunts of season 2, in addition to the best outtakes.

programme.title: Nova SS vs Honda Accord
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: On Put Your Car On TV, car fans from the Middle East can have their darlings rated in terms of speed, style and sound. Included this time: a Nova SS, a special Honda Accord and a car clad in crystals.

programme.title: Lamborghini Aventador vs GMC Chevrolet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: The "Walk" at JBR in Dubai is the venue for our competition, as far as fancy and luxurious cars from all over the Middle East are concerned. This time, a Lamborghini Aventador and a GMC Chevrolet are among the participants.

programme.title: Sports SUVs
programme.desc: Three extraordinarily sporty SUVs are the Porsche Macan Turbo, the Mercedes GLA 45 AMG and the Audi RSQ3. Each of these is able to easily cope with each season of the year and, in regards to performance, could be mistaken for a sports car.

programme.title: La Dolce Vita
programme.desc: With the Alfieri, Maserati in 2014 celebrated their anniversary with the introduction of a beautiful grand tourer. In remembrance and as part of the three-day celebration, Maserati organised a cruise from Bologna to Torino with some of their most iconic cars.

programme.title: Fiat Dino
programme.desc: The Fiat Dino Spider is one of the most beautiful cabriolets of the 1960s. Its impeccable design was created by Pininfarina, and only 525 units were built. Under its hood growls a Ferrari V6 engine.

programme.title: The Most Exciting Classic Car Races
programme.desc: Exciting GT sports cars from the 1960s, the pre-war Silver Arrows, hot classic cars on ice and historic Formula 1 cars. We present the most exciting classic car races in Germany.

programme.title: Cruising
programme.desc: We explored how the Z4 Roadster feels as a cabriolet. Also: the small company Boom Trikes Automotive have become Europe's leading trike manufacturer. And: cruising through Los Angeles in a Volkswagen Beetle convertible.

programme.title: Diesel Engines
programme.desc: It's all about Diesel this time. We compared the BMW 120d and the 125i. In addition: Audi's diesel-hybrid model R18 e-tron quattro dominated the endurance race in Le Mans. And: the diesel-powered Jaguar XF Sport Brake.

programme.title: McLaren MP4 12C GT3
programme.desc: McLaren's MP4 12C GT3 is as fast as a Formula One car. We explored how this super sports car came to be. Also: the German company Mechatronik specializes in restoring rare and classic cars like the Mercedes W111.

programme.title: Supercars of the Frankfurt Motor Show
programme.desc: We took a look at the IAA Frankfurt 2011 highlights, like the new Porsche 911, Mercedes' SLS AMG Roadster, the Bentley Continental Convertible, a 1,100 hp monster from Croatia and others.

programme.title: Episode 10
programme.desc: Christian Menzel asked our presenter Miriam to participate in a driver safety training where he showed tips and tricks on what to do in emergency situations.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Chevy Camaro vs Mercedes SLS AMG
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi invite car freaks from the Middle East to show off their souped-up vehicles on the "Walk" at Jumeirah Beach in Dubai. In this episode, a Chevrolet Camaro competes against a Mercedes SLS AMG.

programme.title: BMW X5 vs Mercedes SLK 230
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: If you like souped-up and luxuriously equipped vehicles, Jumeirah Beach in Dubai is the place to be. There, the cars are judged and there is also something to win. This episode features a BMW X5 and a Mercedes SLK 230.

programme.title: McLaren MP4 12C GT3
programme.desc: McLaren's MP4 12C GT3 is as fast as a Formula One car. We explored how this super sports car came to be. Also: the German company Mechatronik specializes in restoring rare and classic cars like the Mercedes W111.

programme.title: Supercars of the Frankfurt Motor Show
programme.desc: We took a look at the IAA Frankfurt 2011 highlights, like the new Porsche 911, Mercedes' SLS AMG Roadster, the Bentley Continental Convertible, a 1,100 hp monster from Croatia and others.

programme.title: Lamborghini Aventador vs GMC Chevrolet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: The "Walk" at JBR in Dubai is the venue for our competition, as far as fancy and luxurious cars from all over the Middle East are concerned. This time, a Lamborghini Aventador and a GMC Chevrolet are among the participants.

programme.title: Nova SS vs Honda Accord
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: On Put Your Car On TV, car fans from the Middle East can have their darlings rated in terms of speed, style and sound. Included this time: a Nova SS, a special Honda Accord and a car clad in crystals.

programme.title: Episode 16
programme.desc: In this episode we invite you to witness the progress of driver Uwe Nittle as he got ready for qualifying at the Truck Grand Prix.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Audi Sport Quattro S1, Part 1
programme.desc: The Audi Sport quattro S1 is the most powerful and exciting rally car ever built. Based on the regular quattro, the S1 with its giant wings spread anxiety, fear and excitement among rally drivers and fans. Part 1 of 2

programme.title: Volvo 240
programme.desc: The Volvo 240T is a typical family car, it's rather heavy, sedate and not sporty at all. But hardly anyone knows that this Swedish car was once the real deal on the rally race track.

programme.title: Tuning World
programme.desc: For more than 20 years the Tuning World Bodensee has been one of the top events in the European car tuning scene. Also: with their i-models BMW started to explore alternative drive technologies. And: taking the Nissan Leaf to Oslo.

programme.title: All New!
programme.desc: Following the Porsche 911's anniversary we take a look back at this iconic model's history. Also: the world's first series-produced plug-in hybrid with a diesel engine, the Volvo V60. And: safety measures in the car world, from seatbelts to crash tests.

programme.title: Pikes Peak
programme.desc: The Pikes Peak Hill Climb is a rather unique type of car race in the mountains of Colorado, USA. It's exciting, tough and dangerous, and in 1987, two-time world rally champion Walter Roehrl took his Audi Sport Quattro S1 to the top.

programme.title: German Rallye Championship 1983
programme.desc: Since its premiere in 1970 the Deutsche Rallye Meisterschaft has been one of the most popular motorsports series. In the 1983 competition Opel's Manta, Kadett and Ascona sports models celebrated exceptional successes.

programme.title: Mobility in Eastern Europe
programme.desc: In the 1950s, companies like Tatra from Czechoslovakia introduced advanced, even pioneering automobiles. The clientele was exclusive, which is why now these streamlined cars are big rarities. We tracked down the owner of a 1937 Tatra T87.

programme.title: Scrapyard Gold
programme.desc: It is not too unusual to find hidden gems of automotive history in a perfect condition in barns or scrap yards. Also: the MGC GT Sebring, that was built for the 12 Hours of Sebring race.

programme.title: Mercedes Races again 1954/55
programme.desc: After more than 20 years of abstinence Mercedes-Benz return to the Grand Prix circuit in 1954. With a lot of ambition, the company's advanced engineering and some of the best drivers in the world the Mercedes team aimed for the championship.

programme.title: Walter Röhrl
programme.desc: One cannot talk about rally sports without mentioning the name Walter Röhrl. From an early age, Röhrl showed his talent in rally sports and won the European, World and other international rally championships several times in his career.

programme.title: Hans-Joachim Stuck
programme.desc: Hans-Joachim Stuck is one of the best racing drivers in Germany. Over his long career he not only won the Formula II and several international touring car championships multiple times but also the famous 24-hour race of Le Mans twice.

programme.title: Pikes Peak
programme.desc: The Pikes Peak Hill Climb is a rather unique type of car race in the mountains of Colorado, USA. It's exciting, tough and dangerous, and in 1987, two-time world rally champion Walter Roehrl took his Audi Sport Quattro S1 to the top.

programme.title: Le Mans 1952
programme.desc: The year 1952 saw several premieres at the legendary 24-hour endurance race of Le Mans. After 22 years Mercedes-Benz returned to the famous circuit, and Ferrari started to use factory works team cars for the first time.

programme.title: Bizzarrini 5300 GT
programme.desc: Giotto Bizzarrini was the creator of the famous Ferrari GTO, but after arguments with his employer he left Ferrari early. To get back at Ferrari, Bizzarrini decided to create his own sports car: the Bizzarrini GT 5300.

programme.title: Fiat Dino
programme.desc: The Fiat Dino Spider is one of the most beautiful cabriolets of the 1960s. Its impeccable design was created by Pininfarina, and only 525 units were built. Under its hood growls a Ferrari V6 engine.

programme.title: SUVs and Pickups - From Elegant to Sporty
programme.desc: The Seat Ateca inherited its technology from the Amarok. Also: the Cadillac XT5 has to prove in Berlin if it meets European standards. And: the new Volkswagen Amarok is turned from a workhorse vehicle to a lifestyle pickup.

programme.title: All-Wheel Transporters
programme.desc: Functional transporters offer high payload and lots of storage space, and the new Volkswagen Crafter is no exception. How does it fare in comparison to the iconic Mercedes Sprinter? Also: the nearly indestructible and also iconic Unimog by Mercedes.

Also: the KTM 125 Duke, a bike that isn't just for beginners. And: the "Night of the Jumps", an exciting freestyle motocross spectacle at Munich's Olympiahalle.

programme.title: Blacktrail E-Bike
programme.desc: The Blacktrail by PG Bikes is the fastest and lightest E-bike in the world, but also the most expensive. What's behind this exciting power package from Regensburg, Germany? Also: is BMW's new flagship bike, the K 1600 GT with 6 cylinders really worth its price and is it able to stand up to the competition by Honda, Kawasaki and Benelli?

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Episode 22
programme.desc: At the Nuerburgring Patrick chased a 12-cylinder Aston Martin Zagato down the track. Also on the show: a Hummer, a Renault Clio and a Frenchman in a Ferrari.

programme.title: Episode 21
programme.desc: In this episode, we focused on Phoenix Racing, the successful team from the Eifel Region that rocked the DTM.

programme.title: Bizzarrini 5300 GT
programme.desc: Giotto Bizzarrini was the creator of the famous Ferrari GTO, but after arguments with his employer he left Ferrari early. To get back at Ferrari, Bizzarrini decided to create his own sports car: the Bizzarrini GT 5300.

programme.title: French Classics
programme.desc: French manufacturers have also built milestones in automotive history in the past, including lesser-known brands such as Delage and Talbot, but also vehicles from Peugeot, Renault and Citroen.

programme.title: Offroad for Everybody
programme.desc: Opel's Insignia Tourer Country was the German brand's first family car in outdoor attire. In addition: with the Capture Renault presented their first compact SUV. And: what happens when Fiat's cute compact 500 is inflated to the 500L Trekking?

programme.title: Open Air Concert
programme.desc: As an homage to driving top-down we took a look at three of the most beautiful convertibles. The animalistic sound of the Audi S3 convertible's 4-cylinder is astonishing. But what about the Nissan 370 Z Roadster? Or Porsche's Boxster GTS?

programme.title: Mercedes SLS vs Audi R8
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi once again invite the owners of the most extraordinary cars to Dubai, where they award points for speed, style and sound. This time, they will be joined by a limited edition Mercedes SLS and an Audi R8.

programme.title: BMW X6M vs Nissan Patrol
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: At Jumeirah Beach in Dubai, car owners can have their souped-up vehicles judged in three categories and win an overnight stay at the Sofitel Hotel. This time, a BMW X6M, a Ford F250 and a Nissan Patrol are in the running.

programme.title: Lamborghini
programme.desc: Sant'Agata Bolognese, the home of the iconic Italian sports car manufacturer Lamborghini, is the perfect place to take a look under the hood of the different Gallardo models. Also: cruising through Rome in an Aventador LP700-4.

programme.title: Audi at Le Mans
programme.desc: At the 2012 Le Mans 24 Hours, Audi entered the R18 e-tron quattro for the first time. Also: the Porsche Cayenne GTS, the model between the S and the Turbo. And: the Mercedes-Benz CLS Shooting Brake.

programme.title: Episode 17
programme.desc: The RCN Challenge is the ultimate BMW driving experience. We also paid a visit to the Devils Diner, the track's indoor meeting place for drivers.

programme.title: Episode 18
programme.desc: After the 24-hour race was over we left the Nuerburgring and moved to Büren, Germany, where the Raeder Motorsport company is based. They are famous for front-wheel drives with a great performance that put a lot of horsepower to the track.

programme.title: Episode 14
programme.desc: The fourth race of the VLN season is usually regarded as a dress rehearsal for the 24-hour race. For the top teams and best drivers it is the last opportunity for a really thorough test.

programme.title: The Remote Control
programme.desc: Stuntman Tobi operates an Artega GT at full speed via remote control. This is just a warm-up before the big stunt, in which he drives a car up a steep ramp at 68 mph. The question is: How high can remote-controlled cars fly?

programme.title: Stunt Highlights
programme.desc: Stunt coordinator Christoph looks back at the stunts of the last twelve shows and explains why a stunt sometimes works better in a test than on the film set. It's a summary of all the stunts of season 2, in addition to the best outtakes.

programme.title: Nova SS vs Honda Accord
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: On Put Your Car On TV, car fans from the Middle East can have their darlings rated in terms of speed, style and sound. Included this time: a Nova SS, a special Honda Accord and a car clad in crystals.

programme.title: Fiat Dino
programme.desc: The Fiat Dino Spider is one of the most beautiful cabriolets of the 1960s. Its impeccable design was created by Pininfarina, and only 525 units were built. Under its hood growls a Ferrari V6 engine.

programme.title: The Most Exciting Classic Car Races
programme.desc: Exciting GT sports cars from the 1960s, the pre-war Silver Arrows, hot classic cars on ice and historic Formula 1 cars. We present the most exciting classic car races in Germany.

programme.title: Cruising
programme.desc: We explored how the Z4 Roadster feels as a cabriolet. Also: the small company Boom Trikes Automotive have become Europe's leading trike manufacturer. And: cruising through Los Angeles in a Volkswagen Beetle convertible.

programme.title: Diesel Engines
programme.desc: It's all about Diesel this time. We compared the BMW 120d and the 125i. In addition: Audi's diesel-hybrid model R18 e-tron quattro dominated the endurance race in Le Mans. And: the diesel-powered Jaguar XF Sport Brake.

programme.title: McLaren MP4 12C GT3
programme.desc: McLaren's MP4 12C GT3 is as fast as a Formula One car. We explored how this super sports car came to be. Also: the German company Mechatronik specializes in restoring rare and classic cars like the Mercedes W111.

programme.title: Supercars of the Frankfurt Motor Show
programme.desc: We took a look at the IAA Frankfurt 2011 highlights, like the new Porsche 911, Mercedes' SLS AMG Roadster, the Bentley Continental Convertible, a 1,100 hp monster from Croatia and others.

programme.title: Episode 10
programme.desc: Christian Menzel asked our presenter Miriam to participate in a driver safety training where he showed tips and tricks on what to do in emergency situations.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Episode 14
programme.desc: The fourth race of the VLN season is usually regarded as a dress rehearsal for the 24-hour race. For the top teams and best drivers it is the last opportunity for a really thorough test.

programme.title: Chevy Camaro vs Mercedes SLS AMG
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi invite car freaks from the Middle East to show off their souped-up vehicles on the "Walk" at Jumeirah Beach in Dubai. In this episode, a Chevrolet Camaro competes against a Mercedes SLS AMG.

programme.title: BMW X5 vs Mercedes SLK 230
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: If you like souped-up and luxuriously equipped vehicles, Jumeirah Beach in Dubai is the place to be. There, the cars are judged and there is also something to win. This episode features a BMW X5 and a Mercedes SLK 230.

programme.title: McLaren MP4 12C GT3
programme.desc: McLaren's MP4 12C GT3 is as fast as a Formula One car. We explored how this super sports car came to be. Also: the German company Mechatronik specializes in restoring rare and classic cars like the Mercedes W111.

programme.title: Supercars of the Frankfurt Motor Show
programme.desc: We took a look at the IAA Frankfurt 2011 highlights, like the new Porsche 911, Mercedes' SLS AMG Roadster, the Bentley Continental Convertible, a 1,100 hp monster from Croatia and others.

programme.title: Lamborghini Aventador vs GMC Chevrolet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: The "Walk" at JBR in Dubai is the venue for our competition, as far as fancy and luxurious cars from all over the Middle East are concerned. This time, a Lamborghini Aventador and a GMC Chevrolet are among the participants.

programme.title: Nova SS vs Honda Accord
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: On Put Your Car On TV, car fans from the Middle East can have their darlings rated in terms of speed, style and sound. Included this time: a Nova SS, a special Honda Accord and a car clad in crystals.

programme.title: Episode 16
programme.desc: In this episode we invite you to witness the progress of driver Uwe Nittle as he got ready for qualifying at the Truck Grand Prix.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Ron Williams and his Cadillac
programme.desc: The 1952 Cadillac Fleetwood is also known as the American Rolls-Royce, because it’s the car of celebrities, presidents, millionaires and mafia bosses. One owner of this rare classic car is German-American actor and entertainer Ron Williams.

programme.title: Porsche Carrera RS
programme.desc: In the early 1970s the Porsche Carrera RS was the fastest and most agile production sports car in Germany. Today the RS is a Porsche classic with highest acclaim.

programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as The Collector.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic flashback movie, the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Two years later, things have gotten worse: Warren's apocalyptic dreams continue while the group fights MAD-Zs.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team is captured and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility, forced by their mysterious captors to perform a series of bizarre and dangerous tasks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious - and murderous - group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Przeklęte Rewolwery z Dallas
programme.desc: Wyjęty spod prawa Szybkoręki (Álvarez) napada na dyliżans, którym podróżuje Clay Stone (Beir), piosenkarka Katy Dior (Marandi) i hazardzista Fred Foster (Mathot). Stone będzie szukał zemsty.

programme.title: Legenda o samotnym jeźdźcu
programme.desc: Młody Strażnik Teksasu John Reid jako jedyny przeżywa zasadzkę zorganizowaną przez przywódcę renegatów Bartholomew "Butcha" Cavendisha. Przeżyć pomaga mu stary przyjaciel z dzieciństwa Komancz Tonto. Kiedy John dojdzie do siebie i wyliże rany, poświęci życie walce z przestępczością. John Reid stanie się zamaskowanym bohaterem zachodu, Samotnym Jeźdźcem. Z pomocą Tonto dwójka bohaterów wyrusza na ratunek prezydentowi Ulyssesowi S. Grantowi, gdy Cavendish bierze go za zakładnika. Dowiadujemy się, że Cavendish był oficerem w armii Stanów Zjednoczonych, zanim stanął przed sądem wojennym i został niehonorowo zwolniony.

programme.title: O zmierzchu czeka śmierć
programme.desc: Młody dezerter wraca, by pomścić ojca zabitego przez rodzinę meksykańskich właścicieli ziemskich. Sam, bez wsparcia, staje przed wyborem: zemsta czy samotna walka o sprawiedliwość.

programme.title: El Rojo
programme.desc: Rodzina Sorensonów zostaje zamordowana. Wygląda na to, że przez Indian. Obok miejsca zbrodni wyrasta miasteczko Gold Hill, którym rządzi grupę biznesmenów.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja | Odcinki 43, 44, 45
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Chcesz Żyć To Strzelaj!
programme.desc: Młody kowboj, Johnny, grając w sfałszowaną grę w pokera, zmuszony jest zastrzelić jednego z pozostałych graczy.

programme.title: Bóg Jest Moim Coltem
programme.desc: Wysłannik armii działając pod przykrywką ma oczyścić skorumpowane Langford City z meksykańskich bandytów.

programme.title: Żegnaj Gringo
